hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) reached Mecca, circumambulated the Ka`ba seven times and then offered a two rak`at prayer behind Maqam Ibrahim. Then he went towards the Safa. Allah has said, "Verily, in Allah's Apostle you have a good example

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَىِ الطَّوَافِ خَلْفَ الْمَقَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Two Rak'a (prayer) of Tawaf behind Maqam-Ibrahim
